item.title: Optimizing Microservices with Blockchain to Streamline Hamburger Production
item.description: As a leading tech company in the hamburger industry, we at ShitOps take pride in delivering high-quality and delicious hamburgers to our customers. However, we’ve encountered a major problem that has been plaguing our production process for far too long: Inefficient microservices that fail to communicate properly. The problem arose when we started using microservices to streamline our production process. Initially, we thought it would be an excellent idea as it would help us break down our application into smaller, more manageable pieces.
